Articles.Content: There is something that really bothers me in Ksp. Lights illuminate parts, but also anything behind them, instead of parts casting shadows for lights.
I suspect it's an artifact of how they apply physics to every part, but I can't imagine it'd be too hard to add a mask for parts in-between the light and the part in question.
I'm just confused as to why the light module is such an enigma. The light from the sun is at least somewhat realistic.
